revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR842N |revision=(UN/EU) v3.x |series=N300 |asin= |fcc_date=01/06/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7WR842NV3 |ic_id=8853A-WR842N |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9531;AR9531-BL3A; |cpu1_cspeed=650 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FVSIG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3R12E40CBF-8E |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9531;AR9531-BL3A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware=LEDE |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Multi-Function Wireless N Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/TL-WR842N.html Product page]{{â€¢}}[http://www.tp-link.com/en/download/TL-WR842N.html Support page]
"2050500589" and "1523" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/TE7WR842NV3/Internal-Photos/1590163R-TL-WR842N-Internal-Photo-2861713 FCC photos].
Per the manual, the default SSID pattern is '''TP-LINK_XXXXXX''' (last :three octets of the BSSID, presumably upper case hex letters).
*[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr842nd ''TP-LINK TL-WR842N(EU) v3.1'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
